title: SGC Graded N172 Old Judge Hanrahan *****SOLD*****
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: SGC Graded N172 Old Judge Hanrahan *****SOLD*****
posts.post_content:
Beautiful 1889 N172 of William Hanrahan playing for the less-common Minneapolis Millers of the Western Association. FAIR grade primarily for the mounting residue on the reverse, but otherwise in very nice condition.

$500 net to me for Insured Priority Mail shipping to you.

Will take Venmo or F & F Paypal, but prefer check or money order. 

[url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url] for questions
Kevin,  nice card - it's from the Oregon Find.
